## ICellState interface

Describes the state of or a state update for a single [cell](./ts-sudoku-lib.icell.md) in a [puzzle](./ts-sudoku-lib.puzzlesession.md)<!-- -->.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export interface ICellState extends ICellContents 
```
**Extends:** [ICellContents](./ts-sudoku-lib.icellcontents.md)
